What is it with Japanese cinema's fixation on student/teacher relations?

This movie is one of the finest examples of the "Pinku" genre, and probably the best of the "Female Teacher" series.  The plot is just downright silly.  Don't come here looking for high art.  There's plenty of nudity, and both boy/girl & girl/girl sex (depicted in R-rated fashion).

Definitely worth the price.  It's too bad current U.S. cinema is almost completely devoid of sex & nudity (remember the 80's?).  This film is just begging to be remade with a modern cast!

The story seemed interesting, but there is too much censorship, and this does not even rate an R for sexualcontent because of those great blur patches someone other than the director intended, which ruins the whole thing. I returned this item. Very disappointed.

This movie was ridiculous. It had no good story and was not a true pornographic movie which was disappointing as it was a gift. Oh well we got a chuckle out of it to a degree. It arrived in good condition.

This one turned out to be better than I expected.  Not high drama by any means, but the actress playing the teacher does a good job of making her character attractive, even loveable at times. Yes, she's the girl who "can't say No" but still provides a more compelling look at another culture's attitudes (and how their women deal with those attitudes) than you might expect from this type of movie.

In Japanese with sub-titles -- no big loss since the visuals communicate what's happening with sometimes stunning clarity.  And no, it's not nearly as explicit as today's films, but in this case that's actually a good thing.

Good transfer to DVD; images are always sharp. I guarantee you will watch this one more than once.
what can I say lots of nudity rapes and perverts again one to watch but if you do buy it wait till its really cheap

The lovely Reiko has taken a new teaching job at a creepy old high school. She is an extremely attractive woman and the young students in her class have fallen for her. One night, after tennis practice, she is brutally assaulted in the locker room shower by a man with a stocking over his face.

Left on the floor naked and in shock, she discovers a single puzzle piece left behind by the crazed man. A few days later, a pair of students enact a perverted sexual revenge on Reiko for kicking someone off the tennis team. Could one of these students be the man who brutalized her in the locker room? Who owns the strange puzzle piece?

As the mystery unfolds, Reiko must come to terms with her own sexual urges and fate. With shocking scenes of torture and violence, including a shower assault that clocks in at almost four minutes, FEMALE TEACHER: IN FRONT OF THE STUDENTS is one of the more unforgiving and jaw-dropping films

The purpose of a review is to assist you (the reader) to decide if you want to spend your money on this item.

In this case, it depends on your taste.

This is a Japanese "pink" or softcore film. There is abundant nudity and sex.  The question is does the plot (what there is of it) appeal to you.

Plot: Japanese female teacher gets her students angry at her by getting a 'popular' male suspended from the tennis team.  She is attacked in a gym shower. She is seduced by a female student who then sets her up to be captured and molested by the male tennis player.  That's basically it.

If it appeals to you, get this film.  The actresses are attractive. While not the hardcore that other studios and countries produce, there is more plot to go with the nudity and sex. To many this will make this softcore movie more appealing than the 'no plot' hardcore.

It's all up to personal taste.

(Note: Please let's not argue about whether this qualifies as a true Japanese 'pink' film. I used the term in this review to give a general idea of the genre of movie to which this conforms.  In the 60's to early 70's, pink films were a bit more violent than this one is. However over the years, the term 'pink' can be applied to a wide spectrum of Japanese adult movies.)
